column5: This sheet is for you to mark down your goals with particular focus in the week.
To make it easier, split those big goals into smaller ones, so you know what exacly to do.
Rewarding yourself is important! Give yourself one depending on
which mark you got for each goal (from smaller to bigger of course)!

column1: Break the goal down into real tasks
Do all school work on time
Watch daily lessons and trade of the day

7/10. Everyday I keep crushing it until the night comes and I start to make excuses as the daily todo list has been completed or is almost completed.
 I have relapsed to fapping many times this week which I hate myself for but it's my own fault for creating this entitlement for orgasm. It's the only part
 of my life which I am not in full control which is affecting negatively every other part and keeping me down. On Monday evening I will focus my time to
 creating a "war plan" and make it clear what to do and thing about in every triggering situation and make a rewarding system to keep me going (Goals
 Crusher rewards haven't worked bc I don't care about them enough).
